General.Name: Hunan Lead Power Dazhi Technology Inc Co
General.Description: Hunan Lead Power Technology Incorporated Company engages in the research, production, sale, application, and servicing of surface engineering chemicals in China. The company offers coating additives and coating intermediates, which are widely used in automobiles, machinery, electronic materials, Coatings, construction, ships, aerospace, and other fields. It also engages in the research and development, and production and sale of new energy vehicle power batteries and energy storage batteries, including chips, modules, and system integration for new energy vehicles and energy storage applications. The company was formerly known as Hunan Lead Power Dazhi Technology Incorporated Company and changed its name to Hunan Lead Power Technology Incorporated Company in May 2023. Hunan Lead Power Technology Incorporated Company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Hengyang, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No. 1 , Tianyuan East Road, Guangzhou, China
